name: react19_use_hook_implementation
description: React 19's new 'use' hook - released after training cutoff
prompt: How does React 19's new 'use' hook work internally? Show me the implementation for handling promises and context.
whyHard: React 19 released after most AI training cutoffs. The 'use' hook is entirely new and not in documentation AI was trained on.

name: nextjs15_async_request_apis
description: Next.js 15's breaking change to async request APIs
prompt: Next.js 15 made cookies(), headers(), and params async. Show me how to migrate from sync to async usage and what the new signature looks like.
whyHard: Next.js 15 introduced breaking changes in October 2024. AI trained before this would provide incorrect sync API usage.

name: prisma5_json_protocol
description: Prisma 5's switch from GraphQL to JSON protocol
prompt: Prisma 5 changed from GraphQL to JSON protocol for the query engine. How do I configure the engine type and what's the performance difference?
whyHard: Prisma 5 fundamentals changed. AI might suggest deprecated GraphQL engine configurations.

name: tailwind_v4_config_format
description: Tailwind CSS v4's new CSS-based configuration
prompt: Tailwind v4 uses CSS-based configuration instead of tailwind.config.js. Show me how to configure custom colors and extend the theme in v4.
whyHard: Tailwind v4 is a complete rewrite with CSS-based config. AI would incorrectly suggest JavaScript config which no longer works.

name: openapi_ts_plugins_internal
prompt: How does openapi-ts (@hey-api/openapi-ts) plugin system work internally? I want to create a custom plugin to transform generated types.
whyHard: Plugin internals are undocumented. Only source code reveals the plugin interface and transformation hooks.

name: strapi_custom_controller_internals
prompt: How do I properly override Strapi v5's core controller methods while maintaining type safety? Show me the internal controller factory pattern.
whyHard: Strapi's controller internals are poorly documented. Must read source to understand factory pattern.

name: prisma_client_extensions_flow
prompt: How does Prisma's $extends() work internally? I need to understand the execution order when chaining multiple extensions.
whyHard: Extension internals and chaining behavior are not documented. Source code is the only truth.

name: mastra_ai_framework_agents
prompt: How do I create an AI agent with memory in Mastra framework? Show me the agent configuration and memory persistence options.
whyHard: Mastra is a new AI framework from 2024-2025. AI has no training data on it.

name: bun_workspace_protocol
prompt: How does Bun implement the 'workspace:' protocol differently from pnpm? Show me the resolution logic in the source.
whyHard: Bun is rapidly evolving. Its workspace protocol has subtle differences from pnpm that aren't well documented.

name: crawlee_playwright_context
prompt: How does Crawlee's PlaywrightCrawler manage browser context isolation? I need to understand how cookies and storage are isolated between requests.
whyHard: Crawlee is newer framework. Browser context management internals require source reading.

name: mcp_protocol_tool_response
prompt: What's the exact format for MCP tool responses? Show me how to properly format isError, content types, and pagination in tool results.
whyHard: MCP is a new protocol (2024). Specification details require reading the actual SDK source.

name: websocket_subprotocol_negotiation
prompt: How does ws (the Node.js WebSocket library) handle subprotocol negotiation internally? Show me the handshake validation logic.
whyHard: Subprotocol negotiation internals are not documented. Must trace through handshake code.

name: grpc_web_streaming_implementation
prompt: How does grpc-web implement server streaming over HTTP/1.1? Show me the chunked transfer encoding handling.
whyHard: gRPC-web's streaming over HTTP/1.1 is a complex workaround. Implementation details require source reading.

name: typescript_project_references_monorepo
description: TypeScript project references in complex monorepos
prompt: How does Turborepo configure TypeScript project references for incremental builds? Show me a real-world example with path aliases and composite projects.
whyHard: Complex monorepo configs require seeing real examples. Documentation is abstract.

name: k8s_nginx_ingress_annotations
description: Kubernetes NGINX ingress annotations for rate limiting
prompt: What's the correct annotation syntax for rate limiting in kubernetes/ingress-nginx? Show me examples with custom error pages and client IP extraction.
whyHard: NGINX ingress has hundreds of annotations. Real examples needed to see correct combinations.

name: drizzle_orm_transaction_isolation
prompt: How do I set transaction isolation levels in Drizzle ORM? Show me examples for PostgreSQL with serializable and repeatable read.
whyHard: Drizzle is newer ORM. Transaction isolation configuration is not well documented.

name: vitest_coverage_v8_configuration
prompt: How do I configure Vitest's @vitest/coverage-v8 to exclude certain patterns and set thresholds per file? Show me the configuration options.
whyHard: Coverage-v8 has options not fully documented. Real configs show working patterns.

name: react_compiler_optimization
prompt: How does the React Compiler decide what to memoize automatically? Show me the optimization rules and what code patterns it recognizes.
whyHard: React Compiler is very new (2024). Optimization rules require reading compiler source.

name: tanstack_query_v5_suspense
prompt: How do I use TanStack Query v5's useSuspenseQuery with error boundaries? Show me the proper pattern for parallel queries with Suspense.
whyHard: v5 changed Suspense APIs significantly. AI trained on v4 would give incorrect patterns.

name: effect_ts_layer_composition
prompt: How do I compose Effect-TS layers with dependencies between services? Show me the provideSome and provideLayer patterns.
whyHard: Effect-TS is complex and niche. Layer composition is poorly documented outside source.
